meanings.sent1: I recataloged my book collection to keep it organized.
meanings.sent2: The librarian recataloged the books after they were misplaced.
meanings.sent3: After the mix-up, I recataloged my DVDs to avoid confusion.
meanings.sent4: She recataloged her thoughts before making a decision.
meanings.sent5: The scientist recataloged the data to ensure accuracy.
